virtualization_mode.description: This value dictates that VMware ESX Server (HoneyClient::Manager::ESX) is used as the primary virtualization mode.

address.description: The IP or hostname that all Manager modules should use, when accepting SOAP requests.

service_url.description: URL of the VMware ESX Server.

user_name.description: The username used to login to the VIM service running on the ESX server.

password.description: The password used to login to the VIM service running on the ESX server.
